ygData.subject: Re: Thanks Iskandar
ygData.msgSnippet: To train your dodge, keep fighting. It maxxes out at every level and doesn;t increase until you hit a new level. Suggestion. Make sure you put a point in
ygData.messageBody:
To train your dodge, keep fighting. It maxxes out
at every level and doesn;t increase until you hit a
new level.<br>Suggestion. Make sure you put a point
in all of your skills. Easy to do. Start of with
1HB, 2HB, 2HS, 1HS, Dodge, Pierce, Offense, Defense,
etc etc. Make sure when you go to train at your
guildmaster to put one point in the skills you want. It is
really hard to train low level skills once you get
higher in levels. Do it now. Ask anyone in game about
putting a point in a skill and they will explain it to
you.<br><br>Pist<br>Warrior of the 29th Year.<br>Quellious/Norrath Foreign
Legion
